document.full_text: greece is nearing agreement for supplemental eu/imf loans of 50 to 60 billion euros to cover its funding gap in 2012 and 2013 in exchange for bold privatizations, greek newspapers reported on wednesday.
document.title: greece to conduct bold sell-offs in return for aid-papers
lines_and_colors: greece is nearing agreement for supplemental eu/imf loans of 50 to 60 billion euros to cover its funding gap in 2012 and 2013 in exchange for bold privatizations, greek newspapers reported on wednesday.
